metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36092 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: It's possible to create an email which contains specially crafted link andit can be used to perform XSS attack. This issue affects: OTRS AG ((OTRS))Community Edition:6.0.x version 6.0.1 and later versions. OTRS AG OTRS:7.0.x version 7.0.27 and prior versions; 8.0.x version 8.0.14 and priorversions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
